Articles.Content:
If I go to the launch pad, then return to the VAB, everytime I click on a part, it freezes for a few seconds, and then I can attach it. If I try to launch, then go back Again, it will freeze for even longer.

Heres the List of mods: [http://imgur.com/XDQp0nS](http://imgur.com/XDQp0nS)

Thanks!

removed post
